name: Darren PLEAZE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pleaze v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Darren PLEAZE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of December, 2006, the Board’s Motion to Dismiss for Mootness is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
913 A.2d 862
Darren PLEAZE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 17 WAP 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 4, 2006.
